results.name: CosmoDoodle
results.description: The Cosmic Landscape of CosmoDoodle
results.fullDescription:
The Cosmic Landscape of CosmoDoodle

Theoretical physicist Leonard Susskind wrote a whole book dedicated to the so-called cosmic landscape, which is the space of the Super-Megaverse with many ‚Äòpocket universes‚Äô, in which habitable zones, such as Earth, can be found.

The diversity of the cosmic landscape suggests very different living conditions. Some planets are too cold, if their orbits are far from the main star of the system. On others, it is too hot, if the distance to the star is minimal. Nevertheless, the point is that any environment can be home to a particular form of life. The inhabitants of the ‚Äòsteam room‚Äô planet and the planet-ocean will not be alike ‚Äì that's for sure. However, each population take the laws of physics on the home planet as familiar and normal as earthlings take the fact that they need air for living, and for comfortable living the temperature at the Earth's surface should be 15 degrees Celsius.

Today there is scientific evidence that the cosmic landscape design includes at least 10^500 habitable zones. This has worked out as inspiration for the galaxy of artists to create unique CosmoDoodle worlds. And you have got a chance to walk along them under the stars...

results.name: Bitcoin Price Predict
results.description: Any Ethereum user can predict the price of Bitcoin. After the countdown ends, the user who predicts the closest price will get the most rewards.
results.fullDescription:
Game Description:

The closer the predicted price is to the final price, and the greater the transaction volume, the more rewards you will receive. 

The game suspends user participation serveral hours in advance to avoid the price approaching the final result.

results.name: Mintbase
results.description: Mint, Sell, Trade, develop NFTs on your own smart contract
results.fullDescription: Dev ecosystem on NEAR to Mint, Sell, Trade NFTs on your own smart contract

results.name: Capital DEX
results.description: Capital DEX is a decentralized exchange with AMM mechanism primarily for asset tokens.
results.fullDescription: Capital DEX is a decentralized exchange primarily for real-world asset tokens. It was launched on December 25, 2020 in Switzerland. Capital DEX uses a liquidity protocol based on the Automated Market Maker (AMM) algorithm powered by Ethereum to exchange ERC-20 tokens. Capital DEX has liquidity pools for the Curio ecosystem tokens and tokenized assets (collectible cars tokenized on the CurioInvest platform), as well as for other ERC-20 tokens. Capital DEX also runs liquidity farming, wrapping for Car Tokens, a bridge between Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain for Curio Governance Token (CGT).

results.name: Strike Finance
results.description: Decentralized Money Market
results.fullDescription: The Strike Finance is a decentralized money market built on the Ethereum that enables users to borrow and supply collateral onto the platform without central authority or control.

results.name: Cell Land
results.description: The first-ever fully decentralized NFT-based cryptocurrency billboard
results.fullDescription:
Cell Land has been developed as a completely decentralized NFT-based project that uses the full potential of this technology to create material and intellectual ownership of a billboard for up to 14,400 brands.

Cell Land with the help of a unique method of proof of action (POA) has been able to create a permanent visit to this billboard through a chain of people eager to mine the utility token (CLD) of the platform

results.name: Deafbeef V2
results.description: Generative audiovisual art. Nothing but a C compiler. Pushing the limits of multimedia stored completely on-chain.
results.fullDescription: DEAFBEEF began an as art project in 2020 at the start of the COVID 19 pandemic. I emerged after 7 years living under a rock while my kids were young, to discover that modular synthesizers had come back into style. Having a background in electrical engineering, sound recording and music, I was excited the culture of synths had re-emerged. However, there was a certain amount of consumerism in the new culture, and I decided to take an alternative ascetic approach of using 'nothing' to make music, rather than sink time and money into expensive hardware that many seemed to view as magical "black boxes". Nor did I want to upgrade my 10 year old laptop to be able to run the latest DAWs. I opted instead to rebuild from scratch, using only a cheap laptop running Linux, emacs text editor and a C compiler. The intent is to work at a fundamental level, scrawling numbers directly into digital storage media later to be interpreted as sound and images.

results.name: Ethereum Finance
results.description: Leverage the eFi token using eSTOCKs and eBONDs through trading and staking.
results.fullDescription:
eFi is the base token for multiple projects, eSTOCKs, and eBONDs launching at regular intervals.

Each eBOND will yield EFI token as a reward for staking Liquidity Pool tokens.

Ethereum Finance will add support for more Liquidity Platforms in the future.

results.name: Gachadass
results.description: Color changing tokens
results.fullDescription:
Gachadass is a DAPP on Ethereum that allows players to collect ERC-721 Non-Fungible Tokens (NFT) that change to different colors.

The tokens you get from the Gachadas are displayed in a display case and can be placed freely.

results.name: ebox
results.description: ebox provides a simple & straight-forward blockchain-based escrow service, together with trustless over-the-counter (OTC) trading and increased privacy.
results.fullDescription:
ebox gives users the possibility of reversing transactions, should anything ever go wrong - By providing a smart contract based escrow service, users can cancel outgoing transactions at any time, if anything went wrong (mis-typed / mis-copied recipient address, sent too much, etc).

Additionally, users can engage in 100% DeFi over-the-counter trading (OTC). With ebox, two parties can simply send & request ETH/BNB/MATIC/REEF/MOVR and ERC-20 tokens from each other (coming soon: NFT support!), which enables completely trustless trading, right on the chain with no intermediary whatsoever.

Everyone using ebox also benefits from an increase in privacy, as any transaction going through the ebox smart contract is obfuscated by nature. With the additional privacy feature and the upcoming partial payout, it becomes practically impossible for any third party to determine who has been sending how much funds through ebox.

results.name: ShibaSwap
results.description: SHIB, LEASH, BONE ‚Äî ShibaSwap ‚Äî Innovative Reward System ‚Äî The Shiba Incubator ‚Äî And more. 585k+ Community Members and Growing Fast!
results.fullDescription: From its inception, Shiba Inu has done things differently. Starting with a supply of 1 quadrillion, our founder, Ryoshi, locked 50% in Uniswap, then ‚Äúburned‚Äù the other half to Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin for safekeeping. To help reverse the devastating spread of Covid-19 in India, VB has since utilized SHIB in the largest crypto donation in history, and then actually burned 40% of its total supply to a dead wallet, ensuring our long-term success and stability. In the words of Ryoshi, ‚ÄúThank you to the woofmeister for enabling true decentralization. Now we truly begin.‚Äù

results.name: Angoname
results.description: a decentralized secondary marketplace for Blockchain domains
results.fullDescription: Angoname is a decentralized secondary marketplace for Blockchain domains where users can purchase and sell their domain names. These Blockchain domains here replace cryptocurrency addresses with a human-legible name.

results.name: Tadpole Finance
results.description: Tadpole Finance is a DeFi service for saving and lending. It lets users deposit cryptocurrencies and earn interest, or borrow other crypto assets against them.
results.fullDescription: Tadpole Finance is a DeFi lending protocol. In more technical terms, it's an algorithmic money market protocol. You could think of it like an open marketplace for money. What distinguishes Tadpole from other DeFi projects is that anyone can register any ERC-20 token with Tadpole into the lending protocol. Once a token is registered on the market, people can send some deposits into the protocol to earn interest or borrow the token by placing certain collateral and paying some interest.

results.fullDescription: The Hero wants to be at the dawn of the formation of a new paradigm. That‚Äôs the reason why he is trying to immerse himself in this new world with the purpose of studying meta-universes, games, art, and all kinds of communities - in general, everything that this space will give him.

Crypto Hodlers are programmatically generated from over 470 unique traits. All Crypto Hodlers absolutely unique and amazing, but some are traits and types are rarer than others.

results.name: SupDucks

results.description: Scape Forum is a modular DeFi minigame based around NFT fusing. Burn NFTs and stake CWS to acquire newer, more powerful NFTs.

results.name: Rubic
results.description: Rubic aggregates 70+ blockchains, while it enables swaps of 15,500+ assets with the best rates, highest liquidity, and transaction speeds - in one click.
results.fullDescription:
Rubic aggregates 70+ blockchains and testnets, while it enables swaps of 15,500+ assets with the best rates, highest liquidity, and transaction speeds - in one click, thanks to the integration of 90+ DEXs and bridges.


Users no longer have to roam across Web3 to compare rates and liquidity; they can make cross-chain and on-chain swaps of any available token to any other one on https://app.rubic.exchange/. On top of that, Rubic‚Äôs app along with our cross-chain widget provide fiat on-ramp services, making crypto easy to access and buy.


We also provide tools for dApps to enable cross-chain swaps. Rubic‚Äôs functionality can be implemented by any crypto project willing to become interoperable, with an easy-to-install widget and fully customizable SDK.


Important Note: Rubic does not show any Total Value Locked (TVL) as it operates as an aggregator, with liquidity sources offered by its providers.

results.name: BambooDeFi
results.description:
Defi with farms, pools,lotteries,staking and Bamboo field farming system. Controlled emission and max supply limited to 30 million.
Already listed on Exchanges.
results.fullDescription:
BambooDeFi has been part of the ETH network for some time , operating on the Uniswap platform and allowing Bamboo token holders to convert their ERC-20 to BEP-20 via the bridge deployed and accessible at www.BambooDeFi.com in the ETH section.

Audited by Red4Sec, the smart contracts audit can be reviewed on the project website, in the documentation area.

Now, Bamboo is a digital panda that runs on two blockchains and allows its followers to exchange value between the Ethereum and Binance networks. Not to mention the special financial incentives for providing liquidity in pairs in its pools and farming the token.

This offer is completed with other products... staking, lotteries or the YieldFarming system multiplier. Even with the option to improve yields with combined operations. (And a few more surprises that are already in the pipeline and will be coming in the near future).

Liquidity can be added to the USDT/BAMBOO and TKP/BAMBOO pairs via UNISWAP.

However, from BambooDeFi.com own site, liquidity can also be added to ETH, WBTC, USDT, DAI  

We are possibly one of the few DeFi's that will participate in the documentary Crossing The Yellow Blocks.

Over the coming weeks, new pairs will be added to expand the range of options.

Keep an eye on the contract on Etherscan:

https://etherscan.io/token/0xf56842Af3B56Fd72d17cB103f92d027bBa912e89

Already listed on Pancakeswap,Uniswap, MEXC,Gate.io & Tokpie.

STAY PANDA ! !

results.name: dDEXX
results.description: dDEXX is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralized Exchange (DEX) with profitable DeFi Yield Farms, pools, and much more.
results.fullDescription: dDEXX is an Automated Market Maker (AMM) based Decentralized Exchange (DEX) with profitable DeFi Yield Farms, pools, and much more.

results.name: REL
results.description: REALNANCE Token (REL) is a decentralized digital asset developed by JXCC based on Ethereum.
results.fullDescription: REALNANCE Token (REL) is a decentralized digital asset developed by JXCC based on Ethereum. It is the proof of stake in JXCC communities‚Äîholders enjoy the rights to vote in JXCC ecosystem, elect JXCC team members and participate various community activities. The total issuance amount of REL is set to be 20 billion. As token of JXCC, REL empowers all community builders and participants, improves JXCC ecosystem and helps JXCC becoming a leading digital asset trading platform that provides secure, stable and convenient services for all users.

results.name: Cross Mint
results.description: A multi-chain 721/1155 NFT minter that allows creators and hobbyists to mint out their creations on Binance Smart Chain, Polygon, and Ethereum.
results.fullDescription:
Cross Mint is a multi-chain 721/1155 NFT minter that allows creators and hobbyists to mint out their creations on Binance Smart Chain #BSC, Polygon #MATIC, and Ethereum #ETH all from a unified interface.

üî• What makes this so interesting to us as an infrastructure project is that the NFT minter itself is designed with various components in mind which we will of course document quite extensively next week. This includes:

1. Creators having the full ability to take their NFTs to other platforms easily;

2. The Hot Cross platform benefiting from wide adoption via a fee structure in the mint;

3. Support for 3 chains and 2 NFT standards from Day 1;

4. No reliance on a view layer to perform beautifully;

5. Support for images, GIFs, audio, and video;

6. And a clear road to an SDK and API that other parties can integrate into their own products.

ü¶∫ And is this safe? Absolutely. Cross Mint itself has undergone audits from some of the best firms in the industry including SlowMist, Beosin, and Omniscia.

results.name: AMEX
results.description: AMEX proposes a system that utilizes a multi-signature topology as well as account permissioning and whitelisting in three separate hardware enclaves of crypto.
results.fullDescription:
This will be done in such a way that the user retains custody of their private keys, while also having a high degree of security, with minimal interaction or forethought by the user. The proposed system will consist of a smartphone app, a smart agent (internet connected appliance). It will be possible with our coming project DEFRAG.

While many see the benefits of a price-stable cryptocurrency that combines the best of both fiat and Bitcoin, not many have a clear plan for the adoption of such a currency. Since the value of a currency as a medium of exchange is mainly driven by its network effects, a successful new digital currency needs to maximize adoption in order to become useful. We propose a cryptocurrency, AMEX which is both price-stable and growth-driven. It achieves price-stability via an elastic money supply, enabled by stable mining incentives. It also uses seigniorage created by its minting operations as transaction stimulus, thereby facilitating adoption. There is demand for a decentralized, price-stable money protocol in both fiat and blockchain economies. If such a protocol succeeds, then it will have a significant impact as the best use case for cryptocurrencies. We will give to all our holders AntiWhale, NoBot Tech Frontrun and Cross-Chain Bridge System.

results.name: bRing.finance
results.description: BRING FINANCE is a decentralized cross-chain staking platform.
results.fullDescription:
In a space, where the single-pool staking ecosystem is overly saturated and yields lackluster rewards, we are excited to bRing you a tool, aimed at eliminating the current market inefficiencies. bRing is a decentralized cross-chain platform, enabling the multiple tokens‚Äô faming via staking of a single coin.

By combining a set of all-rounded and unique projects in a pool, we enable the cumulative farming with the help of a single token, thereby increasing the potential revenue our users may generate.

Our first goal is to bRing an operational diversified platform to the Ethereum network, with plans to organize a fully functioning BSC bridge to attract more iquidity and community participation to our protocol.

Our innovational referral system is yet another unique feature our experienced team of blockchain developers bRings to the table. It incentivizes our community to invite other participants to the established pools, rewarding those they refer and themselves with higher yields. bRing‚Äôs user interface offers a seamless transition from other similar platforms, while also building upon the existing projects in the space, providing our community members with simple and convenient user experience.

Our staking solution will offer cross-platform-generated yields, with a sole requirement to stake a single project‚Äôs token. In addition, the imbedded gamification feature incentivizes the participants to stay for the entire duration of farming, since they will largely benefit from the accumulated rewards. At first, we plan to launch 90 days pools to establish the trust of our community (i.e. if you begin staking on the first day, you can stake for the next 90 days, however, the longer you wait the shorter the period gets).

results.name: cudl.finance
results.description: Cudl.finance is a play-to-earn game developed by NFT20. Feed your pet and receive $CUDL to level up.
results.fullDescription: Feed your pet a variety of different dishes to increase its score and to earn $CUDL. Don't let your pet starve, you'll have to feed it regularly or it will leave the game!

results.name: CosmoArt
results.description: According to legend, CosmoArts digital art objects belong to the brush of alien authors from parallel galaxies.
results.fullDescription:
CosmoArts Parallel Worlds

CosmoArts is a collection of cryptographic NFTs, collectively created by the team of fifty professional artists, inspired by the beauty and harmony of the Hartle-Hawking proposal. The authors have mathematically substantiated the possibility of the existence of an infinite number of universes, which are similar to ours as well as completely different ones...

According to legend, CosmoArts digital art objects belong to the brush of alien authors from parallel galaxies. The personalities of space artists are amazing and unique, just like their canvases. The creators of reflective paintings, magical murals and revolutionary installations are geniuses, art hooligans, time travelers, mutant alchemists, and even Carl the ship who was given a soul with help of abiogenesis.

Pictures differ in the history of creation, and artistic techniques, and subjects. At the same time, there is something uniting them into a single collection ‚Äì these are the high values of the Noble Age of Space Art.

results.name: PERI Finance
results.description: An innovative synthetics issuance and derivatives market protocol
results.fullDescription:
PERI Finance is an innovative synthetics issuance and derivatives market that utilizes blockchain technology to supercharge trades through its protocol.

PERI Finance allows accessing a wide range of both traditional financial and crypto assets in the form of leverage and non-leverage synthetic products. We empower users with the lower GAS fee, speedy transactions, and ample security from front-running or flash loan.

results.name: Recharge Bridge
results.description: The Recharge cross-chain bridge allows for interoperability between major smart chains with the Recharge token. Recharge is a multi-chain token.
results.fullDescription:
The Recharge bridge allows for Recharge ($R3FI) tokens to be transferred from one smart chain to another. Recharge is committed to giving its holders access to the bleeding edge of crypto trends and developments. 

The bridge currently allows for seamless transactions between the Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain networks. Future support for Polygon is currently being developed with a long roadmap of network expansion on the horizon.

To use the bridge currently, they can access the Recharge App hub, and select the networks they wish to transact with. Recharge is the only reflection token with cross-chain support, with an interlinked supply. The bridge is able to constantly check and validate that the total supply is in fact 5 million tokens across all bridged tokens. This allows for everyone to be able to remain in the trustless environment we strive to create with cryptocurrencies.

results.name: CoinsLoot
results.description: The first of its kind, CoinsLoot is a blockchain-based decentralized platform that enables users to purchase loot boxes using USDC
results.fullDescription:
The first of its kind, CoinsLoot is a blockchain-based decentralized platform that enables users to purchase loot boxes using USDT, an ERC-20 token to reveal a reward. The mechanism is similar to the swap mechanism available on popular exchanges, however, CoinsLoot has added fun and entertainment to it while allowing users to get preferred cryptos as well as diversify their portfolio in the process.

One of the motivating factors of launching CoinsLoot was to add excitement to the process of trading and investing in crypto. Gamifying crypto with a reward-based system ensures people have fun trading while possibly getting free crypto and/or real-world items. Vitally, CoinsLoot wants to involve everyone in this fun experience. That‚Äôs why it goes beyond crypto to include items like laptops, smartphones, Netflix subscriptions, sneakers and headphones are among the list of items users can expect to get on its platform.

results.name: Barn Owlz
results.description: These Owlz are a HOOT! 3,000 Barn Owlz taking flight on the Ethereum blockchain.
results.fullDescription: These Owlz are a HOOT! 3,000 Barn Owlz taking flight on the Ethereum blockchain. https://opensea.io/collection/barn-owlz

results.name: NFT20
results.description: NFT20 is a decentralized exchange and protocol for tokenizing NFT projects as ERC20 tokens to make them tradable on decentralized exchanges such as UniSwap .
results.fullDescription: NFT20 is a decentralized exchange and protocol for tokenizing NFT projects as ERC20 tokens to make them tradable on decentralized exchanges such as UniSwap or Sushiswap. Anyone can add their NFT to the appropriate pool and receive ERC20 token derivatives representing that NFT project that can be traded on dexes right away. By creating a secondary market of ERC20 derivatives of NFTs, NFT20 hopes to address the liquidity problem in the NFT space. Addressing this problem allows for arbitrage opportunities, allows investors to gain price exposure to NFT projects without identifying and buying individual NFTs, and allows for fairer price setting and easier trading of NFTs by collectors and newcomers alike.

results.name: YEL.Finance
results.description: YEL - a next-gen hybrid DeFi protocol that focuses on yield enhancement and is currently powered by Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Fantom and Polygon.
results.fullDescription:
Yield Enhancement Labs (YEL) - a next-gen hybrid DeFi protocol that focuses on yield enhancement and is currently powered by Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Fantom and Polygon.

YEL manages liquidity across multiple DeFi protocols and chains, bringing together yield farmers and protocols to facilitate maximum capital efficiency.

We have already passed Solidity Finance Audit and cooperate with such major players as QuickSwap, ApeSwap, SpookySwap, SpiritSwap, HyperJump, AnySwap and others.

results.name: Nowswap
results.description: Nowswap is a Dex featuring low transaction fees for small-sized trades.
results.fullDescription:
Nowswap is the industry‚Äôs first decentralized exchange protocol on the Ethereum featuring a low, dynamic transaction fee for small-size trades under $3,000, addressing the largest underserved part of DEX users.

The team behind Nowswap has multiple-year experience in the largest internet and crypto companies.

It is available and public now on Ethereum! You can try it out at https://nowswap.org/.

results.name: Intersmart
results.description: A matrix project based on binary marketing
results.fullDescription:
A matrix project based on binary marketing, with the automation of all promotion processes. The complete absence of human factors that negatively affect the construction of the binar. All data is stored on the blockchain. Striving to make online earnings reliable for everyone.

INTERSMART.IO network is built on binary marketing, where you earn money by filling in the structure of the binary platform.

The playgrounds consist of 2 - 5 tiers. In the upper one there are two users, in the second 4, in the third - 8, in the fourth - 16, and in the fifth - 32. There are four Sites in total, and in each subsequent one there is one tier less than in the previous one.

To start filling in the binar, you need to purchase the Level 1 Site, which costs 0.1 ETH. Of this amount, 0.08 ETH goes to the binary, and 0.02 ETH goes to the project's advertising budget. This is the only investment you need to make.

You start to receive earnings from the first user in the lower tier of the binar.

After the platform is completely filled, part of the profit is transferred to your wallet, the second part is spent on buying the platform of the next level, and the third part is spent on reinvesting the current platform.

Net profit from the platforms:

From the first: 1.2 ETH. There are 6 reinvestments available.

From the second: 8.96 ETH. There are 6 reinvestments available.

Third: 30.72 ETH. There are 7 reinvestments available.

From the fourth: 122.88 ETH. There are 9 reinvestments available.

One of the conditions for receiving payments is the presence of at least two personally invited partners.

results.name: Morpher
results.description: The one-stop-shop trading platform powered by Ethereum
results.fullDescription: Morpher lets you trade 700+ stocks, crypto, commodities, indices, forex and unique assets. Users invest MPH token in a market (e.g. Apple stock) they wish to trade long or short, whereby the resulting price-action difference is materialized in the minting and burning of staked tokens. Should the user‚Äôs position earn a profit, tokens proportional to the return are minted, and, if the user realizes a loss, a proportional amount of their staked tokens gets destroyed. There is no liquidity or counterparty risk on Morpher, there are no middlemen and no commissions, as all trades are made against smart contracts.

results.name: MARS4
results.description: The first Real-Life Mars simulator.
results.fullDescription:
Scientifically inspired Play-2-Earn Multiplayer web3 game with survival experience! Discover the perfect blend of science, innovation, and multiplayer excitement! 


The MARS4 project's development team has modelled the detailed 3D map of Mars' terrain after NASA's Mars data. Think of it as the Mars equivalent of the Google Earth 3D map. Each plot with its topographical form based on this data sets the area of play for the Mars4 Play-2-Earn game, turning each unique NFT into a playable and interactable zone on the virtual Mars.

The MARS4 project is split into three interconnected parts: Mars Land NFTs, $MARS4 dollars, and Play-2-Earn game. All these elements will come together to create an interactive virtual Mars with its own economy.

MARS4 users purchase land plot NFTs to cultivate civilizations and terraform them in the game. Landlords can build upon, rent, and sell their lots. In addition, they can get ownership certificates, change the name of the land, pay for a range of avatars, wearables, and in-game assets such as vehicles all while earning $MARS4 dollars. In this way, the world on Mars leverages NFT Mars Land, Gamification, and Token Redistribution to create attractive tokenomics for traders and investors.

results.name: Crypto Volatility Index (CVI)
results.description: The Crypto Volatility Index (CVI) is the first-of-its-kind, fully decentralized Volatility Index, bringing the popular VIX to the crypto space.
results.fullDescription:
CVI is a full-scale decentralized ecosystem that brings the sophisticated and very popular ‚Äúmarket fear index‚Äù into the crypto market. 

Built on Ethereum and Polygon, it consists of an index that tracks the 30-day implied volatility of Bitcoin and Ethereum.

The index ranges between 0 and 200 and is produce based on a Black-Scholes option pricing model, which computes the implied volatility of cryptocurrency option prices together with analyzing the market‚Äôs expectation of future volatility.

The CVI brings a new set of tools to the DeFi space. Users can:  

  1. Buy a position in the index if they believe volatility in crypto is about to grow, as a speculation or as a hedge for their portfolio.
  2. Become a platform liquidity provider to earn fees whether they feel that volatility will decrease or remain the same.   
  3. Protect their position as liquidity providers on DEXs against impermanent loss (caused by major fluctuations in assets price, regardless of the direction)   
  4. Earn $GOVI, the DAO token of CVI, on all of the above.    

  

CVI is an open-source code that allows further trading instruments to be built upon the CVI index by the crypto community.

results.name: NFTrade
results.description: NFTrade is an aggregator of all NFT marketplaces, hosting the complete NFT lifecycle and allowing anyone to seamlessly create, buy, sell, swap, and farm NFTs
results.fullDescription: NFTrade is the first cross-chain and blockchain-agnostic NFT platform. We are an aggregator of all NFT marketplaces and host the complete NFT lifecycle, allowing anyone to seamlessly create, buy, sell, swap, farm, and leverage NFTs across different blockchains. Using NFTrade, anyone can gain access to the entirety of their NFT, unlocking the total value of the NFT market.

results.name: Stoner Cats
results.description: Welcome to Your Higher Consciousness
results.fullDescription: Be a part of the magic. Fund the content you want to watch. That‚Äôs what we‚Äôre doing at Stoner Cats. Purchase one of our collectible NFTs to watch the new series of animated shorts from Mila Kunis and friends, including the creative forces behind Toy Story 2, Spider-Verse, Happy Feet, Cryptokitties and much much more...

results.name: PureFi Protocol
results.description: PureFi Protocol - the one-stop compliance protocol for DeFi
results.fullDescription: PureFi (UFI) is on the mission to bridge a gap between TradFi (Traditional Finance) and DeFi (Decentralized Finance) to facilitate real mass adoption.Its a decentralized protocol that maintains users‚Äô anonymity through Zero-Proof Knowledge architecture. PureFi provides compliance tools (AML, KYC) through Verifiable Credentials & Self Sovereign Identity to protect entities and investors against dirty money risks while interacting with DeFi projects. We will enable institutional investors to participate in a growing DeFi sector through these needed sets of tools.   *PureFi doesn‚Äôt break the decentralization principle. Instead, we focus on maintaining the anonymity of users. *DeFi projects (DEXs, liquidity pool operators, IDO platforms) are enabled to filter all incoming transactions with illicit or high-risk assets and evaluate risk score interacting with each wallet. With the same principle, AAVE already launched an institutional liquidity pool with KYC and AML, showing the trend for such services and institutional needs. *Users are incentivized to use PureFi to protect themselves ahead of future regulation.  *Relationships with several AML and KYC providers who, ahead of time, signed up to provide services and analytics for our users when the protocol is launched.  *Technical and strategic partnerships with Hacken, Arcadia Group, and Casper Labs. *Protocol architecture is designed to direct user interaction with 3rd party providers off-chain to maintain low transaction costs. *Massive interest from TradFi entities (traditional hedge funds, banks) to become customers and users of the platform, highlighting and validating the need for such service. *No toxic investments approach (no-flippers)

results.name: Carpe DAO
results.description: HODL for Everyone
results.fullDescription:
Our mission at Carpe DAO is to simplify crypto for everyone. 

Introducing HODL Vaults

HODL Vaults allows users to deposit their assets and hold for the duration they specify. Once a deposit is made, users receive an NFT that grants access to the assets after the lock time is over.

All of this in a open-source, non-custodial, decentralised way. Your funds are safe in Carpe DAO.

To be release

  • Governance
  • Yield Vaults
  • HODL NFT Marketplace
  • LP Locks
  • Incentives
  • Launchpool

results.name: Wannabes Music Club
results.description: Collection of 10,027 NFTs representing characters from arguably the biggest, warmest, and most vibrant community in the world - the music community.
results.fullDescription:
Wannabes Music Club is a collection of 10,027 NFTs representing characters from arguably the biggest, warmest, and most vibrant community in the world - music community.

  • If you love music as much as we and millions all over the world do.
  • If you're looking for a place where you can express your love for music, meet people, play games, create together, evolve, explore and connect with your soul.
  • If you're ready to see and collect some dope art featuring characters everyone can relate to.

Welcome to Wannabes Music Club Community!

Music unites. It fills you with energy and desire to make this world a better place.

That's why we have no doubt, that our community will attract the most talented, prominent, influential, and passionate people who share our vision.

Imagine, what such a community can achieve!

Personally, we would do everything to become a part of it. And we do.

We are building Wannabes Music Club!

Buying a Wannabes Music Club NFT you get a scarce piece of digital art and access to the unique community and community-only activities, such as music related collaborative visual novel game, community talks and masterclasses with successful musicians, music contests to find friends and create together, and even community music festivals.

results.name: UniDex
results.description: UniDex is the gateway to trade and interact with DeFi. Access liquidity from any DEX on any chain, with a powerful front-end, without sacrificing the experience
results.fullDescription:
UniDex offers an alternative and informative interface to interact with your already loveable DeFi projects like 1inch, Perp.fi, and Opyn. UniDex aims to bridge the functionality offered in CeFi trading that makes trading an easier task, onto DeFi to help service traders and migrate traders onto DeFi.

The backbone of UniDex is to play at the strengths of the DeFi ecosystem. We take a no-bias approach to aggregating trades by working directly on the partners contract and working on top of 10 different chains. As a trader this means youll always be serviced the best trade on the market and even filled at the best price for derivative products.

results.name: Element Market
results.description: The first community-driven aggregated marketplace, fastest buy, much save and earn more.
results.fullDescription:
Element is the first community-driven aggregated marketplace, built to save time and money. Users get access to the best liquidity, lowest transaction costs, and most efficient trading functions.

Optimized Smart Contracts + Bulk Order/Cancel = Gas Savings Up To 49%

Liquidity Aggregation + Cross Marketplace Listings = True Liquidity

Low Marketplace Fees + Trading Rewards = Low Trading Costs

Collection Offers + Mixed Currency/Rarity Rank = Powerful Toolkits

Royalty payments made at the moment of sale = Creators get paid instantly

The Element team keeps up with hot market and industry trends and continuously introduces new products, while also upgrading and optimizing existing features, to bring the best experience to users.Multi-market listing, currently support Element, OpenSea, LooksRare, X2Y2 and other trading markets.

  • Multi-market listings - supported markets include Element, OpenSea, LooksRare, X2Y2, and others.
  • The most abundant ranking system available anywhere - supports multidimensional query of minimum unit time, and adds practical functions such as whale tracking, real-time sales volume and order volume.
  • Superb data analysis - collection pages with Sell Wall advanced charts, scatter charts, and other functions.

Element currently supports BNB Chain, Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche. We are working to deploy it on more blockchains.

results.name: UniLend Finance
results.description: UniLend is a Multichain permissionless Lending & Borrowing protocol for all ERC20 tokens. We are developing a Futuristic Base Layer for all DeFi applications.
results.fullDescription:
Permissionless Lending & Borrowing Liquidity Trading Flashloans Governance

Any ERC20 token will be able to list without any entity controlling the listing process, making UniLend‚Äôs features accessible to every token.

Users have the capability to unlock their token‚Äôs functionality for lending to receive an interest rate and for borrowing by paying an interest rate.

By providing liquidity for asset trading and loans on UniLend platform, users are able to receive fees in proportion to their liquidity pool stake.

A corresponding trading pair will also operate on UniLend platform to include decentralized spot trading functionality for platform users.

Use Flashloan protocol to borrow uncollateralized loans utilize arbitrage, collateral swap and self liquidation opportunities.

Participate in community governance who will decide the future of the platform through a consensus model.

results.name: Marquise $Museum
results.description: SCC certified 4th oldest ERC-20 NFT / 1st NFTx.
results.fullDescription:
Marquise $Museum was created in 2016 as an art business and integrated with blockchain November 2017

It is SCC Certified 4th oldest ERC-20 NFT / 1st NFTx deployed a few months after Autoglyphs, Cryptopunks, Mooncats

There are 3 decentralized NFTx swap Funds on Uniswap and Waves for tokenizing catalogued NFTs at 10% -  30% LTV:

 

NFTx-M1 / Waves Dex

NFTx-M2 / Waves Dex

NFTx-M3 / Uniswap

The complete collection of 83 images is scheduled for Opensea and website publication together with 1 Audiobook NFT and Viking $M1 Cryptobook. 17 are published and trading.

Mint limit:

20x83 image NFTs

1 Audiobook license

30 Viking $M1 Cryptobooks

Floor price index is trailing Autoglyphs and Cryptopunks.

results.name: Hypersign
results.description: Hypersign is a cross-chain Decentralised Identity (DID) and access management infrastructure.
results.fullDescription:
Hypersign is a decentralised identity and access management infrastructure for the enterprise. It leverages technologies such as public key infrastructure (PKI) and blockchain to provide passwordless authentication as well as authorization and verification services that integrate within minutes and are compatible with legacy IAM systems at an affordable price point.

The Hypersign protocol distributes the responsibility of issuance, holding, and verification among stakeholders.

The user gives personal data to the issuer, which verifies and issues a cryptographically signed document (verifiable credential) to the user.

The verifiable credential contains user data along with the digital signature of the issuer. Complete introduction is available in the wiki section: https://docs.hypersign.id/gen/intro

results.name: World Of Women
results.description: 10,000 unique, cool & diverse Women!üåà by @YKarkai
results.fullDescription:
A collection of unique, cool and diverse Women, ready to leave a mark in the NFT space!

10,000 randomly generated digital collectibles of various rarity living on the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-721 tokens and hosted on IPFS.

results.name: Royal Society of Players
results.description: An unmatched collection of 10,000 hand-made NFT playing cards offering members unique perks, prizes, and privileges spanning both the metaverse and real world
results.fullDescription:
Designed by world-renowned playing card artist and designer Oban Jones, these handcrafted cards represent up to 7 different rarity traits (including special edition gold, iridescent, crypto, and other unique designs, paying homage to our many royal influences).

Featuring 192 Decks plus 16 Jokers, no two Players cards will ever be the same. Each NFT was deliberately designed and imagined as a standalone object of fine art.

Royal Society Players cards are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on IPFS for immutable ownership.

results.name: Pudgy Penguins
results.description: 8,888 Pudgy Penguins located in the freezing cold region of the metaverse.
results.fullDescription: This Pudgy Penguin is one of 8,888 sliding around on the freezing Ethereum blockchain. The Penguin is an official member of the Pudgy Penguins community found in the freezing cold, arctic region of the metaverse.
